languages.text: "И восстали мы из тьмы и пепла, дабы стать смотрителями крови, что течет по венам флагмана".

traits.locale_text: "И восстали мы из тьмы и пепла, дабы стать смотрителями крови, что течет по венам флагмана".

languages.text: "And thus, we have risen from ash and darkness to serve as the wardens of the blood that courses through the flagship's veins."
languages.original_text: "И восстали мы из тьмы и пепла, дабы стать смотрителями крови, что течет по венам флагмана".

traits.locale_text: "And thus, we have risen from ash and darkness to serve as the wardens of the blood that courses through the flagship's veins."
"And thus, we have risen from ash and darkness to serve as the wardens of the blood that courses through the flagship's veins."
"And thus, we have risen from ash and darkness to serve as the wardens of the blood that courses through the flagship's veins."
"And thus, we have risen from ash and darkness to serve as the wardens of the blood that courses through the flagship's veins."
"And thus, we have risen from ash and darkness to serve as the wardens of the blood that courses through the flagship's veins."
"And thus, we have risen from ash and darkness to serve as the wardens of the blood that courses through the flagship's veins."

languages.text: «Y así, nos alzamos de entre las cenizas y las sombras para servir como guardianes de la sangre que fluye por las venas de la nave insignia».
languages.original_text: "And thus, we have risen from ash and darkness to serve as the wardens of the blood that courses through the flagship's veins."

traits.locale_text: «Y así, nos alzamos de entre las cenizas y las sombras para servir como guardianes de la sangre que fluye por las venas de la nave insignia».

languages.text: 「ということで、私達は灰と闇から立ち上がり、旗艦の血管を流れる血液の監視役を務めるのです」
languages.original_text: "And thus, we have risen from ash and darkness to serve as the wardens of the blood that courses through the flagship's veins."

traits.locale_text: 「ということで、私達は灰と闇から立ち上がり、旗艦の血管を流れる血液の監視役を務めるのです」

languages.text: “正因如此，我们从灰烬与黑暗之中崛起，成为旗舰血脉的守护者。”
languages.original_text: "And thus, we have risen from ash and darkness to serve as the wardens of the blood that courses through the flagship's veins."

traits.locale_text: “正因如此，我们从灰烬与黑暗之中崛起，成为旗舰血脉的守护者。”

languages.text: "Und so haben wir uns erhoben aus Asche und Dunkelheit, um zu dienen als Wächter des Blutes, das durch die Adern des Flaggschiffs fließt."
languages.original_text: "And thus, we have risen from ash and darkness to serve as the wardens of the blood that courses through the flagship's veins."

traits.locale_text: "Und so haben wir uns erhoben aus Asche und Dunkelheit, um zu dienen als Wächter des Blutes, das durch die Adern des Flaggschiffs fließt."

languages.text: « Et c'est ainsi que nous avons émergé des cendres et des ténèbres pour servir en tant que gardiens du sang qui coule dans les veines du vaisseau amiral. »
languages.original_text: "And thus, we have risen from ash and darkness to serve as the wardens of the blood that courses through the flagship's veins."

traits.locale_text: « Et c'est ainsi que nous avons émergé des cendres et des ténèbres pour servir en tant que gardiens du sang qui coule dans les veines du vaisseau amiral. »

languages.text: "Böylece sancak gemisinin damarlarından akan kanın bekçileri olarak hizmet etmek için küllerden ve karanlıktan doğduk."
languages.original_text: "And thus, we have risen from ash and darkness to serve as the wardens of the blood that courses through the flagship's veins."
